scripts.create: npx create-vite pee-viewer --template react && cd pee-viewer && npm install -D electron electron-builder @vitejs/plugin-react autoprefixer postcss tailwindcss electron-reloader concurrently wait-on && npm install @finos/perspective @finos/perspective-viewer @finos/perspective-viewer-d3fc @finos/perspective-viewer-datagrid @headlessui/react @heroicons/react apache-arrow parquet-wasm@0.4.0
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run create && npm run setup
